Try to reach there as soon as possible,9.30 AM If you want to avoid very long queues take express pass or get the top up by paying extra amount(recommenced) With normal pass waiting time is about 1 hour for some rides Take the maps and decide your rides one day before(best rides can be found on google search) Use locker smartly to avoid paying locker charges, free for some time then chargeable Must visit rides TRANSFORMERS HUMAN vs. CYLON Revenge of the Mummy Jurassic Park Rapids Adventure Etc..

I strongly recommend buying a season pass or Annual pass if you're a local. Tourist? You should get an express ticket. Its more worth your money considering the difference in waiting times. For a ride that may have a 2 hour waiting line, you can go to the front within 5, 10 minutes.
Nice rides. Adult and kids will enjoy alot.transformer is the one ride you should not skip. If there is rush in universal studio take express pass.but finish all rides.Super fun.

3.review_text: Take the express pass. This universal is smaller than its American counterparts, so waiting time per ride increases a lot. No point without express pass.
Small, no need to buy express pass like another USS. If you want to exit and re-enter dont forget to asked for stamp on your hand. Recommend to buy food from outside also

Since I went during Christmas time, I was afraid there would be too many people, so I bought an express ticket on site! Express prices fluctuate, rising as it gets busier, so if you want to buy it, plan your strategy well and buy it in the morning or when the crowds are low. Personally, I think Disneyland is the best.

Those who have been to Universal in Japan or the U.S. may be disappointed. It is worth the price. It is small and the number of attractions is smaller and less fun compared to those in the two countries. I don't think you need a fast pass.
Be sure to quit the express

4.review_text: I strongly recommend the express pass. That way you will be able to skip most queues.
Nice and suggest with express ticket
Unique rides in Singapore. Though is not that big but get Express pass to avoid queues.

A perfect fun day for kids. It was a hot day and to avoid huge queues we bought the Express plane tickets @ 40SGD additional, but we were disappointed to find many rides did not entertain the Express tickets. So best to check out before buying those. Overall it was a good experience, not very different from the Disney Paris, Disney Hongkong and Motion World in Dubai.
Highly recommend to take express pass or else you'll have to come back

5.review_text: Best place to visit in Singapore. Totally worth it. If you have money please do buy Universal express pass to skip the queues and avoid wait time..

Great place , if there is rush buy express ticket from ticket counter at entry , upgrade to express inside park is costly then front ticket count, when i had visited at ticket counter express ticket was of 90 but inside it was 140 for some rides go for single rider specially for Jurassic Park Rapids Adventure ride.
The great experience in here. Maybe on weekend you must buy fast track ticket to avoid queue.

Must visit place for anyone coming to Singapore. Highly recommend the express pass. It's very well worth your time and money. You can do all rides in 4hrs with the express pass even in the most rushed hour at weekends. Else you can stay in queue for minimum 20-30 mins and up to 45mins for popular rides. Very photogenic landmark of Singapore. Check for online deals on carpusell for cheaper e tickets. Take the express pass!!
Rides were great. Definitely get the Express pass and buy early as the cost of Express pass goes up as u get closer to the date.

2.review_text: They don't even give lanyard for 6months season pass anymore. With such exorbitant price that they charged. Disappointed w e stinginess

3.review_text: It is full of privileged ideas, fully demonstrating the superiority of wealth. It is best to buy priority tickets before entering, otherwise you will only be able to play 3-4 games due to the waiting time. Also remember that their closing time is 7:00 pm.

We reached at 9.30 in the morning on a Easter Sunday and entered at 9.45 AM. We bought a single entry express pass, however, we only used the express pass post 2 PM to go for the ride second or third time. The wait time was 90 minutes around 2 PM in the normal que. If you're willing to go to universal studios, reach by 9.45 and you will be done with almost all of the rides by 2 PM without an express pass. 3 ratings because as per the entry pass amount, the park isn't as big as the other ones and everything is way too over priced.

4.review_text: It was a great experience at USS. But its recommended to take the express pass pre-hand while you book the tickets online, coz on the spot they apply dynamic pricing and the ticket rates shoot up according to the foot fall. Overall it was great and we enjoyed it a lot.

Once is enough for me. Nothing much has changed from 4 years ago. The park was so full today that all the food courts were filled to the brim. If you have only one day to experience all the rides I suggest that you get the Express pass for 50SGD. Some wait time can reach up to an hour.

Going to USS is easy. You can choose the MRT or Grab Car and just hop on the tram after. We bought our tickets in the airport which is cheaper by 4 (71 vs 75 upfront). The ticket was open dated so we went on a Monday to avoid long lines. If youre not the patient type, will advise to get the fast pass option as you will still need to wait about 60-90mins for rides like Galactica and Jurassic Park. Be sure to come to the park early as you will be lining up half the time. Bring an empty water container and just fill it up inside. Food and beverages are expensive as its a captured market.

Great but expensive We had a really good day and the park is well designed so that you can move around it quickly. A good range of rides and activities and compared to some parks a variety of food options although few healthy ones. I would recommend you get to the park before choosing the fast pass option as queues were fairly short on the day we visited and would only have done 1 time only pass rather than multiple. Staff were enthusiastic and helpful even with some difficult audiences. All expensive but then that is Singapore.
Wait for long time ,you should buy express ticket

5.review_text: Get express pass if you can afford it
Must try when you are in Singapore and buy express ticket.

Best place and best park to go to Singapore. But if for tourist visiting on peak hour, I will surely recommend to get some ideas about shows and their timings and get a express ticket. This may be expensive but it will surely be a value of money and will result in a better visit.

We loved every but of our time there.. So when we arrived.. I bought my tickets online.. Not from universal but from agencies online make sure to check reviews.. Next we were there by 9.30 way before it open at 10 am... That's good as you get to analyse the crowd and the situation... But why? Because... You should make the decision to purchase the EXPRESS like we did.. It's no joke, if you're planning to come here with family with kids.. With anyone.. Be prepared to spend a minimum of 100 to 50 per person.. The price for express changes based one the demand for it.. So the earliest bird gets the cheaper but on weekends its pretty standard at 100. Why do you need to spend that amount.. Let me tell you why... If you do not want to que at every ride... Carrying kids in the sun.. While trying to finish as many.. Please buy it. We did not que at any except for one ride.. Which didn't have express... While we got express I saw parents with kids... Crying, restless.. Just waiting for literally hours.. No joke.. They waited for 2 hours for one ride.. And rides that lasted you less than 5 to 8 mins.. Can you imagine.. If you wanted to go again.. You had to line another hour or so.. Or longer.. There are two types of express.. 1 limited to just one time per ride.. And unlimited... As many times.. We got the unlimited but if its your first time that's alright.. If you think you only wanted to do everything once. Its preferences. I went for one ride 4 times as I saw the same people in line. As a couple we finished every ride.. Took us 6 hours... I guess even longer with kids.. And also.. We went to nearly ever show.. Get the map and the showtime pamphlet.. And be ready for all.. You wouldn't want to miss it.
Student season pass with express is 198 , worth it to buy tgt with your friends if you wanna have reasons to meetup after seperating schls (going diff educational paths etc )

3.review_text: Great place but I would not recommend buying express passes.. You pay app 70 per ticket and the same amount for a express pass for the day. If you go in the morning yes.. Expect 15-40 min lines but after 5pm and closer to closing times (10pm) the lines drop to like 1 to zero people... Battlestar galactic rides are the best, followed by the Mummy and transformers... Take a bottle of water or snacks if not be willing to pay big.
Good and Expensive explorer

4.review_text: Definitely purchase an express pass unless you want to wait in lines for min 1 hour. Rides also feel rather short, especially if you're waiting in line for over an hour and the ride is over in less than 2 minutes.

It was fun. It's smaller than Osaka, and honestly, it's more fun in Osaka, but Singapore Universal has a different feel... haha. I think it's better to buy Express. You can taste the joy of capitalism.

Great theme park. We got the Express passes which were well worth the price. Not to expensive and cut down on wait time considerably we were never waiting more than 5/10 mins for even the biggest rides. Great day, it's not an huge theme park so fitting everything in in one day is easilt manageable with time to go on some of the rides multiple times. Definitely bring water bottles with you, there weren't many places to buy water in the park it mostly seemed to be sold in cans that are hard to refill. Theres water fountains everywhere though. All the big rides have free to use lockers which is very handy!
It's small but still packs enough to keep you busy for the day. Buy the express pass otherwise you'll spend to long in the queue. Best one is the mummy ride.
Was a very nice studio but some rides don't have express ticket that's all and do buy express tickets you will enjoy all the rides. Very nice one

5.review_text: be pleasant. It's so fun. Express purchase is highly recommended. I laughed so hard that I cried thanks to the Indian people I met in Transformers, and I realized once again that Singapore is a representative tourist destination for people from all over the world.

This is a great place, different world completely. I bought ticket direct from website and with S30 extra got the express pass. It was wednesday when I visited and still express pass was worth it, although on a lot of rides there was only 10-15 minutes wait, but in 3-4 main rides we skipped the que of 40 minutes wait. So it was worth it, as this helped us save a lot of time. But at few rides there was no express lane, and this should not have been the case. Some rides were under maintenance, not good as tourists visit for a day. Overall great experience.
Absolutely recommend the express passes. Cuts the lines down significantly. On the downside, so much quick access makes the park seem a little on the small side. Lots of fun
Go during the off-peak season! That was you won't need an express pass. Also, eat well before heading there and sneak in snacks if you can because the restaurants are stupidly overpriced
One of must visot places in Singapore but dont forget to buy express entry if you want to enjoy.

1.review_text: This place hasn't been updated in a very long time. Queues were ridiculous without an express pass. Definitely avoid.

2.review_text: Not upgraded in times

3.review_text: nice.. was better earlier.. now its just for money making concept
You have to go at least before Senesi

4.review_text: Pls buy express pass if u want to maximize the utilisation of time... And do full and hassel free masti
Always take express line ticket....
Good..slightly overrated. Long que to get into the ride..express pass is must required

You need almost a full day here. It pays to get the Express ticket as with it most rides only took between 2 and 10 minutes to get on, without so.e rides were 60 to 70 minutes waiting. Plenty of shops, food and drink places to keep your energy up. Use the lockers as it can get hot and tiring carrying a bag around.
This Universal Studios is quite small and can be completed in three hours, but the queues wont take long. Its pretty good and has all the essentials, but it seems a bit expensive.

5.review_text: Must go here if you travel to Singapore. If you have more money you should buy the VIP ticket because some rides can have a queue of 1 hour
It is a must do experience in Singapore. Insider tip, use the fast pass if you want to enjoy it to the fullest.

The place is perfect for a holiday with family. starting from the rides which are very exciting, adrenaline challenging. Even though you have to be willing to wait in line, it pays off with an unforgettable experience. Entrance tickets include season tickets for all rides, excluding food and drinks. No need to worry, there are lots of stands selling food and drinks too. and there is also free drinking water that you can fill in your empty bottles. At each ride there is a souvenir shop which is a characteristic of each ride there. To upgrade to an express ticket, you can go through the counter inside Universal Studios. If you have upgraded to an express ticket, you don't need to queue long anymore, because there is a special queue for express ticket users.
Plz take express passes

To truly enjoy this... spend that bit extra and get the VIP Experience.. trust me.. nothing comes close.. i've been to so many attractions..this is by far one of the best theme parks around.. and the VIP experience truly makes the experience exceptional. enjoy your awesome day at Universal Singapore!

1.review_text: Really regret it reeeeeeeally..because when you purchase a ticket they tell you that al rides are free for all your family but when you go inside they tell you that theres a hight limit for most of the rides !!!!!! And so one of your kids shall stay out !!!!!!! At the beginning they just want you to pay but later you realize that it was worthless! Be prepared if you dont buy the express way line ticket, you will wait forever! Another way of purchasing money out of your pocket

What a waste of time. Pay 79 to get in and had to wait 110-150 min for a ride. Decided that was silly so purchased the 140 express ticket to skip the line. What a joke. Still waited 30-40 min for a ride. Managed 5 rides for the day. Highly recommend skipping this unless you want to feel absolutely rotted. Never felt so ripped off in my life.

2.review_text: Go if you buy the express ticket. If not you ll spend your day in the long queue, you may make 4 or 5 rides. Nice place. But hot and expensive.

3.review_text: Great rides. Crazy queues over the weekend. Pay for an express pass to skip the queues. It will be worth it

I bought a voucher at Hana Tour, printed it, and could just take a picture of it, but after waiting in line, I went to the entrance, and the staff told me to enter it, so I went somewhere else, waited in line again, and tried to input it, but they said I could just take a picture at the entrance and go. Definitely try to take a picture..
There are too many people. You must buy a quick pass.

4.review_text: All in all spend 5 hours in it, got the express pass right outside the entrance for 50 , once per ride version, there is a 80 unlimited version, which I feel is to much. With the express pass my experience was good, as expected food and drink items are a few bucks more. Express pass allow you to skip queues that way you can finish all the rides in 5 hours, lots of ride need you to keep your belonging in a locker, that you can rent around the area therefore please bring a bag so it easier. Quite a good place to visit, it compact but with lots of attraction. Bring your own water if you can you will be drinking lots as the place it outdoors mostly.
Express ticket is necessiry for kids
Great but with an Express pass
It was nice because there were a lot of things to see and ride. If you like riding rides, I recommend taking the express ride even if it is expensive. The price is expensive. Please bring a drink
Nice park. During peak season will advice you to get express ticket.

5.review_text: Unlimited Express Ticket Recommendation

Must visit place in Singapore. Avoid public holiday. Express pass is a good investment. With it we could cover almost all the rides. The rush is less in the evening. So if you have exhausted the Express pass then wait till evening, the queues shorten up and the normal line is as good as Express line. Transformer 3D ride is a must.

It was a good experience indeed.The rides take 30 to 45 mins minimum everyday which could be considered as a normal line, If the time for rides goes beyond the 60 mins you should consider the express pass which worths 50SND minimum. With 30-45 mins of waiting per ride one could easily enjoy almost every rides. Talking about the water show, The artists in there are damn funny and undoubtedly a good entertainer. With express pass u will get time to visit SEA aquarium & Laser show in sentosa beach that starts around 7:30PM on the same day. I hope this was helpful!
Awesome Universal plan well priority express unlimited pass is a must if you wish to do 80% of rides and repeat some Transformers Cylon Human are must repeats
Go with your friends, I ADVICE BUYING 100 express ticket because it saves a lot of time especially if you want to finish in one day. Also for me best rides were mummy and cyclon.

1.review_text: I do not recommend, big disappointment, waiting in line "written 40 minutes" in fact 1.40 hours express pass 110 per person. I thought it would be comparable to Disney World in Paris or the wonderful one in Orlando. Unfortunately, if you already have experience in the above-mentioned Disney Worlds, it is not worth spoiling your mood at Singapore Universal Studio. After 2 attractions, we are wondering whether to give up.

Bad and expensive the wea. Without the Fast pass you don't do anything but its value is more expensive than the entrance to the park itself. Be careful, there are 2 versions of Fast, one version is unlimited and the other gives you the right to only one pass per attraction and they mark it as you use it... UNVERSAL YOU STINK...

3.review_text: Small but interesting spot to visit. Compare to Legoland in Malaysia. It is much more expensive and time-wasting. But the experiences are different for sure. I don't think it worth having express pass.
By Express pass...

It's my first time going to Universal, but it's very small and there's nothing worth seeing. Maybe it's because I've only been to Disneyland, but I felt like the souvenirs were a bit low quality. After purchasing the Express Pass, I was able to enjoy the rides without having to wait in line. I don't prefer riding rides, so I go to Disneyland for the fun of watching the parade, looking at merchandise, and seeing street performances, but I felt like Universal was focused on rides.

Next time I will definitely take the express. The waiting line was cool, but... .. Im so hot and tired. I was lucky enough to have a mummy in the 15-minute waiting line, so I took the second ride. As for other things... there are a lot of things I haven't even tried.
Recommended from 6pm. During the day, even if you had to wait 80 minutes, you can get on the train in about 20 minutes. The facility is small so you can visit it in one day. The toilet stinks.

4.review_text: Now experience . Without express ticket this place is not worth for ride lovers. Please buy express ticket in case you love to go on rides
If you found crowded, please upgrade your ticket to express
Buy an express ticket

Beautiful, but the downside is the extreme crowding to enter the games, and you will not find a solution to that except by taking the Fast Express to enter the games quickly... Therefore, advice, advice, advice, if the financial ability does not enable you to take Fast Express, it is better not to go for it at all.. Note: The cost of the Fast Express varies in price, as its prices start from 30 Singapore dollars in the absence of crowding, but as crowding increases, the price of the Fast Express may reach 110 Singapore dollars, and this is something I am completely surprised by in an organized and civilized country like Singapore, and its value should be fixed as in Europe and America.

Do get the express pass or youll regret it. For a ride lasting about 60 seconds, youll have to stad in the queue for 60-80 minutes.. sometimes 90-100 minutes and youll hardly complete 7-8 rides in the entire day.

5.review_text: A lot of people recommend buying an express pass.
Bombastic experience if you have Express ticket
Absolutely worth a visit if you are in Singapore. Mark a day for the visit for sure. Express pass is advisable if you want to try all attractions in a single visit.
Definitely a must go in Singapore. Recommend to get express pass. Totally worth the price, save a lot of time. Can explore everything within 2-3hours with express pass.

I canceled the Limited Express and rode the Transformer twice and the other one once. I definitely recommend Express. I think I waited in the regular Transformer line for about two hours. I boarded the express almost immediately. If you've spent money on a trip and don't want to waste time waiting, I recommend express. However, one tip(?): I don't know if it was the day I went that was the problem, but the equipment often broke down. I had to wait a long time because the Transformer was broken and the Human was also broken. If an announcement is made that there is a delay because the Transformer is broken, don't wait and get on the other one first. It will be resolved quickly haha. I don't think it's as quick as in our country. And since it's hot, I recommend visiting on a cloudy day haha. 1. Express 2. Dont wait for breakdowns 3. Prepare for the heat.

3.review_text: Took 2 hours of cueing for one ride. Better to buy VIP pass if pressed for time. The Universal Studios Singapore is kinda small and the food selections were pricey. The lockers were also pricey so better if you are in a group and take turns to ride the attractions and look after each others belongings so you can skip paying the lockers since they are free for a limited time only which is too short given their long cueing system for a ride.
Good but the queue for games is very long. You have to buy another priority ticket so it's faster
We spent 80 percent of out timing standing in queues. Must buy the express lane online if you are going
Great day but paying extra for a fast pass was disipointed to wait an hour for rides. Out of pocket and waited as long as others

4.review_text: The rides are worth it. I'd suggest buying the fast track pass (extra 5-6 thousand INR) but it's worth it cause then you don't spend all your time standing in queues.

I would suggest everyone to buy express pass rather than normal tickets. It's very crowdy so you have to wait for hours for ride. So better to buy express pass and you will get direct access to all rides. But the place is amazing. Please make sure to download the universal app so get all the updates of waiting time of rides and time of all the street play and activities. Overall the place is 10 on 10
You'd better buy the express ticket unless you will be in very long longgg queue.

Visited this place last Sunday with my family. Nice rides which my Daughter enjoys it very much even though we didnt manage to visit all the rides. Recommend to get Express pass instead and bring your own water.
Fastpass is expensive

5.review_text: First time enter USS..Fully satisfied using express pass..can enjoy all entertaintment without que and waiting so long..

Stuffs you will find from across the world.. Lots of selfie spots, adventure plays, roller-coaster riding. Great view for FAR FAR AWAY, enough to consume 2 days to cover. Otherwise, you can take special pass and enjoy as much game skipping wait time with VIP privilege

Excellent service. Had no issues in booking for my trip in Singapore. The sales staff is always available to help. I did all my bookings through this site. Very much recommended. And most important it is very much cheap with respect to if you are directly buying from the counter
I like this place, take out my stress every time I take the rides. I highly recommend to get the express pass, otherwise you can be queueing for hours to take a ride.
If you visit Singapore, definitely visit. If you don't want to wait long, don't forget the Fastpass.

2.review_text: Very old and dated Universal studios, nothing new or updated. And still require printed tickets for express ride,

3.review_text: Be ready to wait in long queue. Pro tip: buy express pass well in advance.

If you don't buy universal express ticket the wait time will be more on weekends and one day may not be enough to finish all rides. If you have already visited universal studios in US, then you can skip this studio itself and not worth.
Not upto the mark as heard, must see transformers part & mummy zone, rest are ok ok

4.review_text: Waiting times too much, must buy express pass

This one is expensive and if it gets crowded which it usually does you may spend hours in queue for the major rides. One day may not be enough to cover all the park. If you can afford it go for express pass, it may increase the cost but it will save ton of time. If you can spend it, go ahead. Another tip, wherever available go for single rider option. If you are single or willing to split up on rides, you can finish it early. They should allow this option on all the rides. Lots of photo ops everywhere. Kids will definitely enjoy. For adults there are fewer exciting rides, with lots of waiting. They don't allow photography on any ride for safety. That's good. But with appropriate mount for action cams they should.

After entering, you have to wait in line for a very long time. If you don't buy an Express ticket (add approximately 1000 baht per person, you will be able to play every attraction as many times as you want). But if you add 600 baht per person, you can play only one of each) there will be a very long line. Each round of each ride is quite fast and very hot, so bring an umbrella/sunscreen.
No. 9. Get the express pass to have the full experience with rides and haunted house. Even managed to get catch the show.
Be sure to ride the Transformers Mommy Cyclone. If you have a lot of money, please pay for the express as well.

5.review_text: Highly recommend upgrading to the express pass if you are short of time and your not a fan of waiting in long queues
Must try in Singapore. Better by Express pass if you want to enjoy all rides
It is recommended that you purchase an express ticket.
Must try the Transformer and The Egyptian Mummy Ride. Never buy the elite pass for skiping lines because it is in use only in limited rides
Awesome, recommend getting fast track pass if in budget

3.review_text: Smaller universal studios. Lot of crowed Get the priority pass

4.review_text: It is must go place in singapore for people who loves studio experience. Even whole day is not enough to explore whole studio as there will be big queue at every place or ride inside and we need to wait for 1-2 hrs in queue. If time is blocking criteria people should prefer express pass costs around 120 per person Transformers show is the one we loved very much even we waited long time for short time show. There are other good things to experience like dinosaurs park,sounds n movie effects,stunt show(3.30pm), Egyptian roller coaster, cylon/Human roller coaster etc., Need to plan shows timings n waiting time n prioritized Food items n water are costly inside.Should not bring outside food.

Kid friendly place. Highly suggest you spend the extra 100 to buy the express pass and save the time queuing. Some of the queues are horrendously long and you don't want to spend an hour queuing st each ride if you intend to finish the park in 1 day. Most of the food is at 16 per person and drinks from 4 and up, so prepare your own sandwiches if u dont intend to splash on dining.
Express pass was crazy expensive but it was worth it. Make sure to stay until closing time. All the food we had in the theme park was pretty bad (and of course overpriced)

It was quite an adventure, I have the Season Pass. With Express Unlimited, highly recommend this as it is the same price as coming to USS 2 times. The Annual Pass is also recommended. For starters, there 28 attractions (what I remember) 2 of the 24 are water rides includes, Jurassic Park Rapids Adventure, you might get wet so get a extra pair of clothing. The other one is the Madagascar story, luckly it does not get you wet. The Enchanted Airways dollar coaster is great for first time roller coaster riders. It is fast and and scary for starters. We also have the Human and Cyclone roller coasters in Sci-fi City. They are for professional riders. The Puss in boots ride is fun too also for starters, Many like the Revenge of the Mummy, scary, fun and fast all at the same time! This my favourite. There is also many moving about like VR, one of them is a show, and 2 others are rides. Again, get the Express pass lines can get up to 1 hour. The service of the staff at the ticket booth the first time I came here were quite nice. I can say the atmosphere of this place is nice. But the food there not that good. There are many shops here and there. So far just bring a hat and umbrella as weather in Singapore is unpredictable. It could be very hot or very rainy, be reminded that in a event when it rains and the park closes you get NO refund!!
Halloween Horror Night. Having Fun and Good time with Friends. Better to purchase Express Pass

5.review_text: Must visit if in Singapore tour. All rides in it was fun. But buy express pass for rides as there is very long line for every rides.
Awesome..Take express pass if u on weekends..Or else..U will be ending at big que line for every ride
There is a lot to see, but there are also a lot of people and the atmosphere is great. So, it is worth considering purchasing an express ticket. Express tickets are also sold separately inside.
There are quite a lot of people who just cut in line while riding. So, although it is very expensive, I recommend the express ticket.
Get the express pass!!

1.review_text: Dont keep this place in to visit names.....if u cant avoide take fast track or more value ticket

3.review_text: First time visitors can visit this park. But compared to the Universal parks in America, it doesn't have that many rides and felt expensive. Not worth the express pass, all rides are empty after 7. U can ride them as many times u like after this time.
All the rides are still the same, however you can at least get Starbucks inside now. Worthwhile for a first visit if the weather isn't too hot and it's a low season
Costly but nice to see .... Good Experience......

4.review_text: I went during the busy season, and if you buy the Unlimited Express Pass for 160 and the admission ticket for about 70, it will cost you just under 40,000 for two adults. Even if you have an express pass, you will have to wait more than 30 minutes for crowded attractions. . . However, if you don't buy an Express Pass, you'll only be able to ride two or three attractions in one day. Even if it's expensive, I think it's better to buy an express pass during busy seasons. time is money
It's a favorite...but the queue for tickets takes a long time...it's still manual...try it if the system scans the barcode, you won't get tired of queuing at the counter

Very fun, should try your best to get express in order to get the best experience. Although costly, getting a season pass with unlimited express, I would say, along with RWSInvites Membership saves you alot of money. You should try getting a RWSInvites membership 2 weeks prior to your visit.
Express pas is cheating but worth.
Nice and fun for families but everything is four times the price than elsewhere and even with the express pass you still have to queue for hours. 40% would recommend.

5.review_text: Use express pass for better experience

Singapore does it so well. The whole eco-system is flawless - from the purchase of tickets to the travel into the area. Universal Studios is a real treat. Friendly and helpful staff (except for one - who might be having a bad day) well laid out floor plan. Spend the extra money and get an express pass ... not having one might ruin the experience because of the additional long wait in line for rides.
Must buy the express pass before you go online. Its worth it.

We bought the fast passes ahead of time as I had read that the queue times could be really long and it was definitely worthwhile. Some of the rides got up to 180 minute wait, especially for the Battlestar Galactica rides. There were a few other rides that were also very good. All of the rides had long waits in the end, so the fast pass is worth getting. We ate in one of the restaurants on site and it was a kind of self service way, but it still took a long time to queue to get food.
One of my favourite places to visit when in Singapore. Located on Sentosa, with loads to do and see!! Worth getting an express pass to skips the lines.

1.review_text: Visited on December 31, 2019 - the one star is only for the Christmas decorations! Price per adult 89... The highly recommended fast lane ticket costs 199 per person! We had the normal price tickets and didn't get in anywhere. Waiting times over 2 hours until you just give up because you see that only the fast lane ticket holders get in! A real impudence and a really bad system to take money out of the pockets of families with children! Never again Universal Studios Singapore - NOT RECOMMENDED!!!
Without express pass wait for 90min for a ride
Rubbish place to go unless you have money to buy the express pass.

Excellent rides , take priority pass as its worth it to void 60 min or 90 min queue times for each rides. Lots of live shows and minion shop is awesome.

Divided into 7 parts, USS is amazingly huge. Keep the whole day just for this. Especially if you have kids. Advisable to get the tickets beforehand so you dnt spend time checking in. The ticket includes admission to all rides inside. If you have a VIP ticket, special entrances for you. The passes are valid for a few days since time of booking. So you can get them in advance. Each ride has a counter at the entrance telling you the waiting period for the same. Start your day early in the morning so you have less waiting period for each ride. Eateries inside have mainly non vegetarian food. But right near the Transformers, there is a STAR-BOT Cafe....you will get 100% vegetarian food there. And huge bowls of it. Trust me, you won't leave disappointed. Roadside hawkers are also located every few blocks. Big rides like Battlestar Gallactica will take easily about 1hour to await your turn. Plan your day accordingly. Water rides are also amazing and must do.

FUNNNNN! But if youre going on the holidays you gotta take the express pass. If not, youll not be able to go on all the rides because the queue for each ride will be crazy long. You might even have to wait for more than an hour. Its expensive but its worth it! And amaaaziingg!!!

Its worth buying an annual pass! If you only come here once Recommended entertainment in the park: No1-mummy! ! ! No2-Transformers No3-Future Water World show (its worth the price after watching it) In the Lost World area No4-Red and Blue Coaster (divided into red pedals and blue suspended legs) "Tips" Take advantage of the "single" entrance, often there is no need to queue. Sometimes the general channel queues for 2 hours, single people only need to queue for 15 minutes. You can put it before playing mummy and red and blue roller coaster Bags are stored in the lockers, which is very convenient! There are free storage hours, and you will be charged if you exceed the time limit (so remember to bring some cash with you) Try not to bring anything with you when you are waiting for the roller coaster, including your mobile phone! Dont bring it! It will fall off the staff will check it for you before queuing up Recommended food in the park: turkey legs (really huge). The gourmet restaurants in the park are all the same, it depends on what style you want to eat. There is a restaurant in Lost World with a giraffe outside. The fried stick legs inside are OK! If you dont like the restaurants in the park, you can go to the exit to get a park stamp, and then come back in to play after youve eaten enough! Recommended parent-child itinerary: No1-Sesame Street Spaghetti Space Station No2-4D Shrek No3-Madagascar No.4-Jurassic River Adventure No5-The Adventures of the Invincible Cat Swordsman No6-Charizard Flight School After leaving the gate, go right to the seawall steps, facing vivo city. There is a 15-minute free crane ballet water dance show at 8:00 every night. You can watch it! Very exciting The light rail express on Vivo city 3F only charges once when you go there. There is no charge from Sentosa to other stations or back to vivo city. By-walking around the world is like walking through the kitchen at home, people who go there every day to play a round

3.review_text: You can buy cola or soft drinks here. If you go underground, there is a vending machine where you can get a taxi, and you will get double the price. And go early in the morning to catch the important rides first. If a group tour comes later, I can't even think about it.

This is a good place to have fun with ur friends or family but i've lost my ezlink in here lol nvm :(

4.review_text: Interesting experience in USS today (26 Nov 2020). We queued for our first ride: Transformer. 30 mins into the queue, the ride broke down (We encounter power failure while in the queue). Turn out a few rides were affected (Transformer, the Mummy, Jurassic Park rapid adventure and Madagascar crate adventure). So the crowd dispersed and concentrate on other rides making the the queue to balloon to 60 mins or more. Due to covid19, most rides have their capacities reduced by half (they kept alternate row empty for social distancing). Again, this contribute to the longer queue. On hindsight, the best decision I made today: I purchased unlimited express pass for myself and my 2 kids. Instead of queuing for 60 mins, I get to ride 3 different rides in 1 hour. Some rides, I get to ride multiple times. Those downed rides went back up after 2 hours or so (Transformer went down again later in the evening). I noticed the crowds were getting lesser after 6pm. Most likely because most people went for dinner or went home. This is the best timing for getting on rides if you dont have express pass. The rides are open from 2pm to 9pm. I would have rated my experience 2 stars without the unlimited express pass. It seriously worth the splurge.
Awesome...but if you are taking regular pass you have to wait for an hour or more for most of the rides..better select single rider option

1.review_text: If you only purchase basic entry ticket, better than don't come. You will only enjoying queue.

4.review_text: Very hot wear cap and buy express pass
uss was fun n a thrilling experience!! went on a sunday afternoon n wasnt that crowded !! but food and drinks were really expensive !! tip * buy the ticket wt express pass cos its rly worth it !!
Loved the rides.... but be prepared to wait unless u purchase the fast lane pass...

5.review_text: Making full use of the rediscovers voucher and brought family for a day of fun at the Universal Studios Singapore on a perfect cloudy Saturday. Although was told that they have limited the numbers of people into USS, there are still lots of people there. With social distancing in place, queuing in line to various attractions are long, some as long as 2 hours! We queued for 1 hour for the Madagascar ride. Thereafter we decided to purchase the Express Pass which is priced almost the same as the entry ticket. With the Express tickets, the longest wait is about 20 mins, and the fastest was no queue required for the Express lane at Transformer 4D. Highly recommend to buy the Express Pass to better enjoy the rides you desire. The economic return is definitely worth it!

Went during the Covid-19 pandemic (Phase 2) and used the SingapoRediscovers Voucher for USS ticket. Paid an additional 60 cash per pax for USS Express Pass. Waiting Time: Those without Express Pass, the normal queue waiting time for the attraction ranges from 30mins - 1hour 15mins. With the express pass, the waiting time for our queue was about 5-10mins. Definitely worth it as we were able to cover more attractions. F&B: Most restaurants and cafes were open with only a few closed. There are at least 2-3 Halal restaurants open during this period. Facilities: Free lockers available to store personal items during the ride. Musollah for Muslim guests is closed during this period, thus remember to bring your own prayer mats. Overall, experience was great and crowd was on par during pre Covid days. Social Distancing Ambassadors are around to advise guests and can be seen almost everywhere. The only disappointment is the temporary closure of shows due to Covid-19 measures.

Smallest of the Universal Studios around the world but a must visit when you are in Singapore. It would take nearly a day to complete if with family would prefer to buy express pass. And if alone the single person queue is best and also have a lot. Of restaurants but getting vegetarian or vegan food Will be hard.

4.review_text: The Q for the rides are so long. I suggest that get express pass. Should come early. I recommend trying the cyclone, the mummy and transformers

5.review_text: USS is fun! Singapore is incompleteif you dint visit USS. Tickets price! 80S Normal and Extra 80S for Express card which i think is a good option to get a quick entry at every ride otherwise the rides are very crowded and u will have a wait a lot. My personal fav rides were Transformers, Human Vs Cyclone (Rollercoaster) and Zurasic World! Go have fun..

4.review_text: As of 2021, To park at USS on weekdays (cant recall fri same pricing anit), its per entry till 1130pm ish (6), park at B1 East Wing. Those who need stroller or wheelchair access, very far walking distance. If you dont need that access, just take the escalator up and u will right in front of USS entrance. Now using rediscovery voucher, recommended to buy express pass. Q time for non popular ride 5min, popular rides up to 1 hr. Download USS app for q status, mkn places, smoking corners availability, etc Hope that they can have further discounts for singaporeans when purchasing in there in future. Such as soft drinks now at 5, plain water 4, balloon 15 cheapest.

The park is more suited to children and families in general but if youre looking to get on all 14 rides (esp on the weekends or public hols) then it might be worth exploring the express pass otherwise be prepared to queue for about 30-90 mins per ride. An average experience overall.

4.review_text: Wonderful theme part. Primary attraction rides are fully roller coaster based so thrill guaranteed. Go for transformers first if you dont have roller coaster experience. It will be definitely awesome. Then revenge of the mummy is indoor coaster in dark chill environment. Other than coaster thrill nothing much actually. Battlestar galactica coasters both will give you an experience that you wont forget for life. Both humans and cylons equally great. Human coaster is fast and more gravity drops than cylons. Cylons are more about inversion, but its not that scary coz speed cancels out the gravity. So dont miss that too. Express pass recommended if you dont want to wait. I went on a weekend and I didnt wait in queue for any rides. Express line is virtually empty. Queue length and wait time is huge in normal line. Try to reach 30 mins earlier before park rides opens. You will be allowed inside. Can stroll around and get to know the park before starting. 4 star coz some of the rides and shows are cancelled.

We arrived 30 minutes before the park opened. It was already open. We were able to ride popular attractions before they got crowded. It is best to use the Express Pass together. It is a good idea to print out your Express Pass e-ticket at Guest Services at the entrance. There are rides where you can leave all your belongings (including your smartphone) in a locker.

5.review_text: Super Fun and Play like a Kid Again! My only regret is never buy the Express Ticket!

4.review_text: Every child's paradise, but we made the mistake of going during the schools holidays and not buying the express tickets beforehand. The trip did cost a small fortune, but it was enjoyable. I was told the annual passes aren't available at present. I do hope they'll make a comeback.

5.review_text: Use the express ticket worth the extra cost Normal que is minimum 1 hour long
Great park for everyone, make sure to download the app to get the waiting times live. No need for a fast pass if you go during weekdays.

One of the most memorable days of my life was when I visited Universal Studio Singapore. I was accompanied by my Nephew. A plethora of things to do there. You need a full day to cover all attractions and it is always a good idea to have an express pass to avoid lengthy queues. But you need not buy it at the time of planning, you can arrive at the place and check the length of queues and just upgrade to an express. In my view going anticlockwise on the premises would save your time and as much as early is the best.
Express pass is a good option if you can effort. Maybe because of COVID situation, not much tourist right now.
It was a great experience. But a tip of advice if you want to go for each ride you must take the express tickets else you will have to be in queue for long time

Had a great time. Took my 18 year old son for the first time while he was visiting. We went on a very busy Good Friday. To help speed things up we did the VIP Tour. It was a bit costly but well worth it. We got included souvenirs, dining credits, and Express Unlimited cards for after the tour. The best part we had a guide take us around the park wherever we wanted to go and he took us too all the rides up from the exits. We went straight in, zero waiting, ahead of the lines including the Express line. This was great. We could pick the front row or wherever we wanted. We could do multiple times, etc. Some lines had an 80 minute wait. We had none. Again expensive but worth it. Additionally our guide scheduled photo opportunity with Transformers and we were first in line and no wait for Megatron. Funny as a decepticon he was complaining to us the whole time. Good fun. All in all it was hot and humid but moving quickly through the park was super helpful and nice.
The amusement park is highly recommended, the extra price for the fast lane is definitely worth it. So you can experience the entire park in one day and drive the attractions you like more often.
Great experience. Timings 12 to 7 pm, try reaching before 11.15 because queue starts n than it takes 10-15 min atleast.Normal ticket is 80 SGD & exclusive is 8050 SGD.

Awesome adventure rides. Do not miss the transformers ride. And if possible take the express pass, it will be worth as in normal entry the queue is very long and it will take most of the time in there. We had to wait in queue for 1hr 20 min for one single ride in humans vs cylons roller coaster ride. And with express pass it was just 15 mins. Overall a great experience. Day we'll spent

worth the price,express ticket available with less wait the roller coster was so amazing and I can play it for n times! Water park,inside with different ticket purchase as well Casino,restaurant available too

Im in eCommerce for 3 years. Throughout my career in this business, I have been cooperating with different international carriers. You may rely on my long experience, but Uss Express is the best. Im very glad that I found this company, now my store works more effectively than I expected.
If you want the Best experience than must go

Today very crowded. The lost word rides for express pass que 40 minute. The air inside building very hot

A Beautiful Experience.. Even though covid regulations are maintained. The quality is still top notch. Advise the rides have a line for single person.. These are mostly the shortest or have no one at all at times.. Suggest to go thru that line to save time.. Make sure to download the app or keep track on timing during this period as rides, meet & greets, show have a scheduled time.. Of you plan on advance you can definitely do all rides even twice and then some... Same goes to the shows & meet& greets... Also not forgetting to collect the pass for photography, allows you to have your picture taken at multiple locations and then be collected as a group from the Dark Room( that is what universal calls it) And must of course check out the merch shops and momentos.. Or even the food carts for unique packaging such as the dino egg at the Jurrasic section... Which is filled with popcorn and yours to take.. Making it a cute momento..
Very good theme park... Fun day for entire family... Only problem is long que for almost every attraction, so if you can afford you should buy the express pass at the start itself
Most of the things here is good. Just that the games stuff you really need to queue veryyyyyyy long unless you got extra to buy the express way

5.review_text: Great experience! Yes there are a lot to fix, but overall it still amazing what they do in this time. In my opinion, these are my recomendation for you : 1. Always purchase Express Pass. It will save your time, especially in the weekend. 2. Sentosa Train now is free. I don't know for how long, but now even you have to tap your EZLink card, the price is 0 SGD. 3. Go in early, get out late. Maximize your time. 4. Always purchase the souvenirs for at least at 5 pm (2 hours before closing). There will be a long queue if you go at closing time. You cannot freely choose to buy anything. 5. Buy at the Universal Souvenir Shop (next to HelloKitty Store). It is the only place that contains all of the characters. 6. Take photo in the Alley next to the Mel's Restaurant. It have a lot of unique photo spots. Also check when the lights goes on. You will have a bit different ambience of the photos. 7. There will be some closed/under renovations Attractions. If you purchase the standart Express pass, you will be eligible to ride the same attractions more than 1 time if you choose.

Expensive but once in a while, but wasted cos not all attractions open. Maybe price can reduce in such cases as we do not get the chance to enjoy all the rides as some closes, I bought unlimited express for whole family, and wasted
One of the best places to visit, but pls pls and pls do take an express pass.

It's definitely awesome place to go. We've been to Universal Studio Japan before. Relevantly its size is smaller than Japan but it's good size not too big walk around. I used Universal express tickets and I strongly recommend to use it. We used several times in specific attractions. It's recommend to go !! Waiting line is a bit long and Universal express tickets are strongly recommended.
Few people on weekdays You can play all the attractions without using an Express card.

1.review_text: Please do NOT buy express passes. They are not express. You will stop havr to wait over 45 mins for rides here. The efficiency is gone out of Singapore. Broken rides long queues makes this place a must miss.

WARNING: Do NOT buy the unlimited fast/express pass. Until they fix the logistics of the current setup, you have to wait 45 min for all the eligible rides which pretty renders the unlimited rides obsolete. If you do decided to buy the fast/express pass, buy the normal one. You wont have time to sit each eligible ride more than once. We went as a family of 7 on the 1st of July 2022. I hope they use this feedback constructively because until then, we will not be coming back.

4.review_text: This is a theme park located on USS Sentosa Island, which is great because there are many other things to do on the island itself. The price is about 70,000 won per day for adults. Approximately 50,000 won for children It's not cheap at all. Express Pass tickets cost 20,000 to 30,000 won on top of the basic price. The line is quite fast. The scale felt the same or smaller than Lotte World. Because it is a franchise, the prices are quite expensive. If you don't go there just to ride the rides, people who like taking pictures or who like the universal world view will likely enjoy it. Even though it was a weekday, there were a lot of people. Depending on popularity without Express Pass, the wait can be as short as 30 minutes or as long as 2 hours. I was the worst because I didn't like waiting in line. The restaurants in the theme park are packed with people trying to order, and the prices are much higher than Singapore prices, so I recommend eating a good meal before entering the USS. For simple food and beverages sold at stands, the waiting line is long and stock runs out early. There is a card reader, but is it broken? There are many places that only accept cash. In conclusion, I think visiting once is enough.
If possible, it is recommended to purchase an express ticket.

I went on Friday to visit the aquarium at the same time, but it was crowded and the hot weather made it difficult to fully use the rides. I misread the 1-day unlimited pass and mistook it for an admission ticket, but it's better to take the express for about 40,000 won. If you wait in line and ride it once, it's closing time, so ride it once without waiting in line and take a look around and buy a souvenir before leaving. The rides are fun enough, but the price is a bit expensive. Unless you feel catharsis from standing in line, get the express. The egg character t-shirts at the souvenir shop are cute.
Must use express, despite it' very expensive in total. But what can you expect, this is Singapore, one the most expensive city in the world. Using express, cut the queue time more than 50%.
absolutely amazing rides, attractions & food. extremely crowded during peak periods (weekends/public holidays) to avoid spending too much time in queues, purchasing an express pass is recommended.

5.review_text: If you're coming on the weekend, please buy the express. Please, please. It's like going to the regular once for every two times I go to the express. I almost burst into a fit of rage.
Must have express pass to enjoy it to the max.
Must have unlimited express only! Too many people but a lot of good experience

The most fun place in the country. Worth the price paid. One tip to foreign visitors will be to pay extra and avail the express pass. This will save you a lot of time and help you cover a majority of attractions.
Buy the express ticket otherwise waiting time was very long!

1.review_text: Here is the deal, DO NOT come here without an express pass if you are looking to enjoy the roller coasters. You will literally wait 2 hours to get on one ride, and we were there on a Wednesday, and the thing is, the design of the queue lines will fool you, you will think it is not that long, but once you get in and youre stuck waiting for a while, you will find out later on that there will be stairs and way longer lines inside that are hidden very well. Trust me it will be a very disappointing experience if you do not get an express pass for the rides. Other than that, if you are only there for the pictures, shopping and the vibes, it will be extremely beautiful and entertaining.

3.review_text: Use express pass always if you want to have rides. And definitely in sunny days you won't like it because it's too hot. Great rides. Amazing places for photos. Great piece of work definitely.

While traveling, there are places to spend money and places to not spend money. Universal Express (tickets that allow you to ride rides faster) are definitely worth using. Universal Studios itself is small, so you can get around quickly.

4.review_text: Great place! Must visit if you ever go to Singapore. Merchandise and Soviners a bit costly but quality speaks. Be ready to walk a lot. The waiting queues are hours long. Express pass is highly recommended for tourists. It will save a lot of headaches and time. Worth the money. Not much food option available if you are vegetarian be sure pack something up!

Transformer, roller coasters and the mummy ride was amazing Get express pass otherwise you will have to wait in a huge queue. I went on Wednesday thinking there will be lesser crowd but I was proved wrong.

There aren't as many rides in the theme as you might think, but I definitely recommend going. Because there were a lot of people, I only bought the express ride once, and it was perfect. Be sure to ride Mummy, Cyclone, and Human! Puss in Boots is more fun than you think. Highly recommended.
Not all available. Depend on weather and situations. Bring own bottle. Lots of waterpoint.

5.review_text: Always my go-to place every time in Singapore. We bought the express ticket so it helped a lot
Best experience, but need express ticket to avoid delays.

When coming to Universal Studios, it is recommended to buy priority access tickets. Otherwise, in Singapores weather, you will have to queue for several hours for each item and then the game will end in 1 to 3 minutes. There is really no experience at all. Although priority tickets are expensive, without priority tickets, it is almost impossible to experience most of Universal Studios' projects in one day, especially on weekends and holidays. Relatively speaking, the two types of priority tickets can only be used once for all items (except for a few). The unlimited priority tickets are not necessary unless you particularly love one of the items. The Battlestar Coaster is definitely the flagship of all the roller coaster projects at Universal Studios. If there are no health risks, this project is 100% recommended to experience. Of course, this project is also one of the projects with the largest queues (there is also a project with a large number of people queuing for Jurassic World Ride, which I personally think is very average). There is a sister roller coaster next to this roller coaster (red track), which has a lower difficulty level (no 360-degree rotation). Friends who want to ride a roller coaster but are afraid of it can experience this roller coaster first, and then consider whether to go to the Ace Coaster for fun. There is the only Starbucks not far from the entrance of the park. The other restaurants in the park can only be said to be quite satisfactory. The taste and price are not far different from those outside the scenic area. At least it is enough to satisfy your appetite. Compared with the catering in a certain country's scenic area, it is simply too conscientious. Compared with Universal Studios in other countries, the projects are single and the area is much smaller. It is also unbelievable that some products, including the parks sales stores, are out of stock. However, Universal Studios Singapore is still highly recommended as one of the must-see attractions when traveling to New Zealand. Finally, I reiterate that priority tickets are really worth buying if you want to really play. Finally, I wish you (we) have fun!
It is recommended to buy a fast pass ticket first, otherwise you will have to queue for a long time for everything!
Buy a express pass if you want to enjoy all rides

2.review_text: Worst experience. Do not buy regular ticket. Even if they are giving you regular entry ticket for free . Don't take it . ..... You have to wait in very very long queue. For normal transformer ride i have to wait for 2 hours in queue. In 6 hours i only get 2 rides due to long queue. Only buy express ticket. It will cost you double price then regular ticket. Suggestions for universal studios - you should only provide one ticket. Increase the price of tickets as much as you want. If person buys ticket he should get benifit of ticket. Standing in queue for 2 hours for 1 ride is very big disappointment
World class ticket price but few ride not available at the moment. Renovation on going. Kinda small studio...

3.review_text: Tip1: Multi express ticket is a must for those who need to be on they rollercoaster for 5 times. Tip2: Check USS official website before your booking. We only got to know the 2 big sections of Water World and The Lost World are NOT available ! Such a disappointment. Tip3: Prep your food if you are like us, fussy of expensive fast food and drinks. Tip4: Lower your expectation to the beautiful scene of the park. It has been getting aged.

4.review_text: It's amazing if u have great company with u, these rides are insane , express pass is expensive but worth it saves the time a lot on each ride and even on some food lines.
I recommend to buy the express line unlimited , lines are huge there

5.review_text: Nice experience would recommend to buy the express line ticket to skip the line
One of the best attraction in singapore. Every thing worth here. Suggest you to buy express for 1 day time visitor.

So many pros & its worth a visit.. noting a few suggestions. - ask if all rides are working, generally 1 or 2 rides but not function - buy tickets online to get discounts - fill a survey before exiting to get free souvenirs. - express pass is always a worth to buy to avoid wait time. But a suggestion, try the rides always in reverse, start from the last instead of the first. - use lockers for 60mins, they are free - avoid photos at the beginning, start clicking towards the last to enjoy the rides the max possible.
Superb experience with express lane pass

An absolute must if you are visiting Singapore. The rides are great a good selection for all ages. I was surprised that we were done within 5 hrs - so then we went in other rides that we really enjoyed. We dis pay for the fast pass - which I think is worth it. We have 3 young children and were able to skip 1hr queues. So if your budget can stretch to unlimited fast pass I would do it. Good is expensive but you can take your own. Staff are super friendly and helpful.

1.review_text: Rip off, we were told inside that our infant could only go on one ride and then an additional 90 for express lane entries.
Be careful with what you leave in the locker, I was stolen 250, USA dollars I spent 1:20h on Mummy queues

3.review_text: EXPRESS PASS MUST!!! No matter what day it is, the place is so crowded with queues having wait time of one hour at most rides. Without it, you'll be dead waiting guys! Positives: The coaster rides have lockers nearby to store our bags and restrooms at frequent intervals. The staff are friendly. Negatives: Most of the food available inside is very expensive and so are the memorabilia shops. Uss is open only for a limited time(11-6) during which you cannot cover everything especially if you don't have express pass. The app having Map n wait times does not work. Few rides are closed including Jurassic Park rapids yet you have to pay the full amount for the express pass
Must buy express pass! Dont miss mummy ride and transporter ride! Play games and win.! Great adventure park but still can be more rides and more lively!

4.review_text: If you are going to ride an amusement ride, I recommend taking the express. It seems like it's more profitable to pay more and ride more than to spend time waiting.

There are a lot of people. Who recommends buying an express card? The weather is hot in October. There was a queue waiting to board the galactica for 1 hour. After the announcement it was temporarily closed

very fun but disappointing that parts of USS are always under construction so you can never get the full experience or benefit at any given time. due to the crowd its not worth the time to queue so we got express passes which are almost daylight robbery. anyway, worth a go. buy tickets in advance as its cheaper on the website than in person.
Buy universal express pass if u don't want to stand in queue

Compared to other Universal studio parks this one is rather small. We were here for four hours and managed to ride almost everything even without express pass - just use single riders line to be way faster. Unfortunately a lot of rides were closed during our visit. For buying ticket dont use the machines in front of the entrance - buy online and save a lot of money! If you ask kindly, the people at guest services will offer you same price as online.

5.review_text: It is recommended to buy tickets online, it is cheaper than on the spot. There are queues for rides at every ride. To upgrade to USS Express, you have to buy 60 dollars/pax

We visited by October 2nd week. Singapore best entertainment place. Admission ticket is appox 70 and single time express pass is around 60 Bought it near from transformer shop. Express pass is really worthy. But nearly 4 rides are closed(Included photo) so you can use it again for 4 opened rides. Best rides: Transformers, cyclon, revenge mummy.
Better come early, buy ticket in advance, if u have more budget buy express ticket seriously u wont regret buy express ticket since the queue is hella long especially for transformer

The most fun activity on Sentosa Island If you purchase an express pass, you can ride it as many times as you like without having to wait in line, so I recommend that you enjoy it more instead of wasting time waiting in line. It is very small compared to Universal in other countries. More than the difficulty of walking around, waiting in line and the hot weather take away my stamina. The most difficult thing is the inconvenience of having to eat outside in hot and humid weather, as all indoor restaurants are closed due to the coronavirus. At least when you go into a store or see something to see like a theater, you can sit indoors with the air conditioning on and relax.

Well worth a visit. Had a lot of fun here. Express passes are definitely worth it if you can afford it. The passes are on a dynamic pricing system. So prices will increase as demand increases or as the park gets busier. There are two types of express pass. One is for unlimited rides (90) and the other is express pass for one ride each (60), ie ie you can only fast pass each ride once. A wrist band is issued for unlimited rides and a ticket is issued for "single" express pass where the rides are ticked off when used. Our group picked the single fast pass and then was told four of the fast pass rides were closed so we were able to "replace" those with other rides that we liked. We got in just after 12, left at closing and struggled to go on all the rides. Can't imagine the productivity if there was no express pass when queues are 1-2 hours long. Free lockers are provided for some of the roller-coaster which means waiting can seem longer without a phone. Overall a great day out.

3.review_text: Buy the express pass as it helps in skipping long queues at a lot of rides saving a ton of time. Food options are not too great. Rides are good but a lot of them are not operation and many have aged a lot too. Overall a good experience

4.review_text: It was fun. But it would be nicer to be able to enjoy all of the shows and rides. I visited Oct 2022 and only half were open but I pay full price, so it was a bit disappointing, I enjoyed Universal Studio nevertheless. My most fav : Transformer 4D, Shrek, and Enchanted Airways. No need to buy ticket in advanced. If your wallet allows you, buy an express ticket, it is like a vip ticket when you have shorter queue to enter the ride or show. I visited weekday but it was crowded, i really cannot imagine how it would be to visit on weekend.
There are a lot of people at Universal. Be sure to use it on the express section!
Buy tickets online, sometimes there are discounts

Was sceptical to visit this place. But i must say, I was totally blown away by the rides. Worth it to take the express pass if you have a few spare will save you a ton of time, effort and stress. Both the roller coasters, transformers rides and the Egyptian ride were amazing. On the negative side, there isn't anything apart from the rides I mentioned that's worth the time. Gold for family folks and children

Amazing rides and a great place to keep the kids happily busy.Only drawback was lack of directions, there were no maps provided and no kiosks or proper directions for the rides. Other than that everything was good. Wait time was considerably reduced with the express pass so it's a must on the weekends.

5.review_text: Amazing Experience.Massive crowd in the weekends.waited long time for rides.Express passes might be the best option for avoid long queue .

My 5 star rating is for Shahdan. . .who is a staff at Universal studio. We had some issues in booking. He helped us out of the way to make sure our problem is sorted out. In general, all people around Singapore is kind and very helpful by nature specially to outsiders. Undoubtedly Universal studio is just visit place. I highly recommend Express tickets to save time. Transformer Egypt Mummy Must must must do ride.

Love it. Very well organized. If you have the extra money you can get express pass to have faster experience.
kinda sad that Rapids Adventure is closed for now. And queue for rides are insane, it's really worth it to buy express pass in advance.

1.review_text: Horrible experience No erhics Everything expensive and no human values If you said express only Geiger preference , We can buy express ticket . Do you guys think we cant offer additional 20 dollars Totally horrible and worst experience

3.review_text: After visiting this is my thoughts on Universal studios. Gold digger studio. From selling tickets to Express pass & item sold inside, like goodies & item. Normal ticket 80 40-50 extra for express entry for rides only. For some these are used. Just for 9-10 rides. Wait time is increased during early hrs just to create the rush. If it rains all the outdoor rides are closed then only 3 rides are available inside. Rest are show. There are only 4 rides which you must try here is Transformers Battlestar Galactica Human Battlestar Galactica Cyclone. Mummy Ride. No money is refunded if the ride is suspended. Sorry try out next time.

Good to have one time experience. Food options can be better. Safety is given extreme importance (Rides are not allowed during heavy rain and lightings). Express pass is useful if you are short of time and not a local. River Rapids was great fun!!

4.review_text: Nice theme park in Singapore. Better you buy ticket in advance via OTA. Coz sometimes queue is long. You can access from MRT harbour front and change to mrt resort world. Restaurants available on site. There is a vip ticket add on to skip queue. But add on pricing almost similar to normal ticket. Toiket ia clean.
Lack of rides allow Express Pass and the line up is still too long for some rides with express pass. Too expensive to purchase Express passes for only able to use for less than 5 rides.

Coming from the U.S., this place is definitely a little smaller, but still good nonetheless. Purchased the unlimited express pass, and it was definitely worth it, though towards the end of the day lines are definitely less. Overall, decent. Was a little sad that Waterworld was closed though.
So interesting. Come by metro is the best way. Use fast track, you will gain time.
Still like before, but now the MRT is free

5.review_text: A must visit when in Singapore. Lots of rides and attractions, plus meet and greet with characters of Universal Studios movies such as Transformers. Recommended to buy express pass especially for first timers (note: a small number of rides doesnt have express lane).
Buy Express pass in advance.

Must visit when you are in Singapore. The rides are super fun, highly recommend Transformers, Mummy, River Adventures and Roller Coasters. Express pass is a must. Do not waste your valuable vacation time without Express pass, waiting in the queues for hours together. Also purchase tickets online, you get some free vouchers to redeem inside.

Save your money up, and get the Unlimited Express Pass! The pass is super expensive, but with it I covered the whole park, rode all the rides, watched all performances and did not miss any meet-and-greet! Some gifts are only sold at specific gift shops within the park, so you are encouraged to explore everything. Be smart about how you use the lockers, and you get to save a lot of money. But over the past 10 years, the rides generally havent changed much if at all. Definitely enjoyed my visit.
Very happy place but surely should used fast track ticket during peak season

1.review_text: Its basically a money trap, no use of the ticket without express pass which will be sold out quickly due to limited slots

3.review_text: Overall it's pretty good. Tickets are 88 and VIP fast track is rm100 which seems a bit expensive. There were quite a lot of people when I went there on the third day of the new year. Thank you.
The place is very good. But try to call to check how to get Express Pass is very poor and Bad! Keep on directing! So no answer at all!
Went when under renovation 01/23 so everything was a little limited, definitely buy the express pass.
Buy the fast pass. The wait for the ride length isn't worth it. Had fun over all but can't say I would need to go a second time. Jurassic Park was the best!

4.review_text: Definitely visit after Dec peak period is a good choice. Queues are shorter and we managed to cover all major rides in 6 hrs w spare for quick lunch. Buying tickets on the day last minute also saved us 5% discount.
The rides are awesome but worth buying the express tickets. Singapore is too hot to be waiting an hour to get on a ride. Also better to buy the tickets at universal.

Character meet & greet events were awesome and my child enjoyed them most.. Transformers ride was also amazing.. General note : if u see there is rush at the park, and if u have some extra money then advisable to buy the express pass so u can beat the queue at the various rides/attractions..

Good place loved it .. Games are superb, movies are superb .. Good place but you need 2 days to cover entire universal studio.. Negatives : If you don't have express pass you will have to wait for long long hours.. You feel bad when express pass fellows enter without waiting.. This is too bad nothing but making money..

5.review_text: singapore traveler are come from all parts of the world... recommend to get express ticket:)
It is highly recommended to buy tickets in advance to avoid queuing on long lines. Without much patience, you may opt to buy the universal express add on to get priority access on attraction.
Good but need to buy the express pass
Buy an Express Pass

Ahhh Universal. I've been to you 3 times and it's still not enough. I bought the express pass unlimited and can definitely say it was well worth it since I got to go on each ride 8 times. 3.review_text: Great rides - latest technology - if you actually get to ride them, as only 23 of the park is operational at any given time. Cost cutting measures? At least annoying.
